snippet: G.M. decided to spend more and aim higher than ever before on a small car when it produced the Cobalt, but one crucial part was carried over from an older car: a problematic ignition switch.
abstract: General Motors decided to spend more and aim higher than ever before on a small car when it produced the Chevrolet Cobalt, but one crucial part was carried over from an older car: a problematic ignition switch; Cobalt is at center of recall of 1.6 million cars.
lead_paragraph: G.M. decided to spend more and aim higher than ever before on a small car when it produced the Cobalt, but one crucial part was carried over from an older car: a problematic ignition switch.

headline.main: G.M. Saw Cobalt as Its Entry Into a Better Small-Car Market
